trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025CANCELNOTE_00168_GJUSANA_000_000<tab>...Hm? I can't very well dispose of something you don't have, now, can I?

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025CANCELNOTE_00168_GJUSANA_000_100<tab>...Really? Well, I suppose the moldy old book <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> bound for the furnace any─errr...I mean, it breaks my heart to see a piece of history treated like so many pages of soiled parchment, but who am I to argue with a customer?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025CANCELNOTE_00168_00010<tab>All progress within <var 31 ((EventItem)) 03E8020202 /var> will be lost. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025CANCELNOTE_00168_GJUSANA_000_050<tab>There. It's done. That particular bit of history will never bother you again. I hope you're happy now.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025CANCELNOTE_00168_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>You throw away a book from the Trials of the Braves.
